scripts.build: remotion render src/index.ts LedgerlingPresentation out/presentation.mp4 --codec h264
scripts.render:intro: remotion render src/index.ts LedgerlingPresentation deck/videos/00-intro.mp4        --codec h264 --frames=0-143
scripts.render:logo-open: remotion render src/index.ts LedgerlingPresentation deck/videos/01-logo-open.mp4    --codec h264 --frames=144-281
scripts.render:problem: remotion render src/index.ts LedgerlingPresentation deck/videos/02-problem.mp4      --codec h264 --frames=282-569
scripts.render:transition: remotion render src/index.ts LedgerlingPresentation deck/videos/03-transition.mp4   --codec h264 --frames=570-707
scripts.render:meet-alma: remotion render src/index.ts LedgerlingPresentation deck/videos/04-meet-alma.mp4    --codec h264 --frames=708-995
scripts.render:ecosystem: remotion render src/index.ts LedgerlingPresentation deck/videos/05-ecosystem.mp4    --codec h264 --frames=996-1283
scripts.render:how: remotion render src/index.ts LedgerlingPresentation deck/videos/06-how-it-works.mp4  --codec h264 --frames=1284-1571
scripts.render:live-demo: remotion render src/index.ts LedgerlingPresentation deck/videos/07-live-demo.mp4     --codec h264 --frames=1572-1859
scripts.render:value: remotion render src/index.ts LedgerlingPresentation deck/videos/08-value-capture.mp4 --codec h264 --frames=1860-2147
scripts.render:roadmap: remotion render src/index.ts LedgerlingPresentation deck/videos/09-roadmap.mp4       --codec h264 --frames=2148-2435
scripts.render:logo-close: remotion render src/index.ts LedgerlingPresentation deck/videos/10-logo-close.mp4    --codec h264 --frames=2436-2585
